properties.name: application.config.prefix
properties.description: The prefix where configuration files are found

properties.name: signservice.integration.policy-configuration-resource
properties.description: Location where to find the policy configuration

properties.name: signservice.security.user-configuration
properties.description: Location where to find user configuration

properties.name: signservice.cache.state.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age of saved state objects (in milliseconds)

properties.name: signservice.cache.state.cleanup-interval
properties.description: The state cache cleanup interval (in milliseconds)

properties.name: signservice.cache.document.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age of saved documents (in milliseconds)

properties.name: signservice.cache.document.cleanup-interval
properties.description: The document cache cleanup internal (in milliseconds)

properties.name: signservice.sign-message.enabled
properties.description: Whether the SignMessage extension is supported

properties.name: signservice.sign-message.metadata.url
properties.description: URL from where we download metadata

properties.name: signservice.sign-message.metadata.validation-certificate
properties.description: The certificate used to validate downloaded metadata

properties.name: tomcat.ajp.enabled
properties.description: Whether the AJP protocol is active
